metadata.synopsis: This dialog occurs after the argument between Lia and Rolan that Cal attempted to mediate. It's light and friendly, and mainly a chance for the player to get to know Cal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: skip Tutorialgoto 206; 525speak with Cal after breaking up the fight

0.speaker: Cal
0.text: Lia and Rolan would never admit it, but they'd take an arrow for the other. Also stab each other. Not sure what'll come first.
0.context: NodeContext: You have broken up a fight between Lia and Rolan more times than you can count. You're tone is light and friendly as you joke with the player.

1.speaker: Cal
1.text: Thanks for cutting in - there might have been more than words if you hadn't.
1.context: NodeContext: A big friendly smile - you are the most genuine of the group

2.speaker: Cal
2.text: Here's hoping we all make it in one piece.
2.context: NodeContext: This is a joke. Said with a grin.
